      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Conjunctions 2</string>
            <string language="en">Conjunction 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusammenhang 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Conjonction 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Junção 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Congiunzione 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κλίση 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conjunción 2</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Complete the text by writing the right conjunctions in the blanks.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 5 - Who Are You?</string>
            <string language="en">Complete the text by writing the right conjunction in the blanks. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 5 - Who Are You?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">conjunctions</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">conjunction</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Führen Sie den Text durch, indem Sie den rechten
Zusammenhang in die Leerzeichen schreiben. Safir - Englisch und 
Berufsleben für Anfänger - Modul 5 - die Sie sind?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Remplissez le texte en écrivant la bonne 
conjonction dans les blancs. Safir - l'anglais et vie active 
pour les débutants - module 5 - qui sont vous ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Termine o texto escrevendo a junção direita nos
espaços em branco. Safir - vida do inglês e de funcionamento 
para os novatos - módulo 5 - que são você?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Completi il testo scrivendo la giusta 
congiunzione negli spazii in bianco. Safir - inglese e vita 
attiva per i principianti - modulo 5 - che sono voi?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συμπληρώστε το κείμενο με το γράψιμο της σωστής 
κλίσης στα κενά. Safir - αγγλική και οικονομικά ενεργή 
ζωή για τους αρχαρίους - ενότητα 5 - που είναι εσείς;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Termine el texto escribiendo la conjunción 
derecha en los espacios en blanco. ¿Safir - inglés y vida 
laboral para los principiantes - módulo 5 - que son usted?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Saphir</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
